dependencies.package: firmware (>= 9.0), mobilesubstrate (>= 0.9.5000), com.ipamod.watusitools (>= 2.1.18), preferenceloader, applist, com.rpetrich.rocketbootstrap

descriptionlist.description:
IMPORTANT! To activate the tweak, you must log in with a real account.
OnlineNotify Features: • Receive notifications inside and outside WhatsApp when selected contacts go online / offline. (Only works for the contacts you have selected in the OnlineNotify settings) • Get notified when any of your contacts starts to write a message. • Receive notifications when a contact has read the messages you sent them. .
